text: Yallakool is an unbounded village community within the locality of Caldwell in the central south part of the Riverina. It is situated by road about north west of Caldwell and west of Deniliquin, but is a part of the Murray River Council. Yallakool Post Office opened on 17 August 1927 and closed in 1965. ==References== Category:Towns in the Riverina Category:Murray River Council
title: Yallakool
